More XP per Message.name: More XP per Message
More XP per Message.description: Gain increased XP, leveling up faster.

More Gold per Message.name: More Gold per Message
More Gold per Message.description: Earn more gold for each message.

Faster Leveling.name: Faster Leveling
Faster Leveling.description: Level up at an accelerated rate.

Luck Boost.name: Luck Boost
Luck Boost.description: Increase the chances of finding rare items or receiving extra rewards.

Double Gold Rewards.name: Double Gold Rewards
Double Gold Rewards.description: Earn double the gold for each message.

Epic Loot Find.name: Epic Loot Find
Epic Loot Find.description: Discover exceptionally rare items more frequently.

Legendary XP Bonus.name: Legendary XP Bonus
Legendary XP Bonus.description: Receive a substantial XP bonus on reaching milestones.

Master of Wealth.name: Master of Wealth
Master of Wealth.description: Generate a significant amount of gold per message.

Quick Reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
Quick Reflexes.description: React faster in battles, gaining an advantage.

Merchant's Bargain.name: Merchant's Bargain
Merchant's Bargain.description: Unlock exclusive discounts when buying items from the shop.

Stealth Mastery.name: Stealth Mastery
Stealth Mastery.description: Increase your chances of successfully evading enemy encounters.

More Clicks.name: More Clicks
More Clicks.description: Allows you to get more Clicks in the Clicker Game.

Reduce Rewards Cooldown.name: Reduce Rewards Cooldown
Reduce Rewards Cooldown.description: By Getting this Upgrade you can decrease the Time between the daily, weekly, monthly cooldown..

Reduce Fishing Cooldown.name: Reduce Fishing Cooldown
Reduce Fishing Cooldown.description: Reduces the cooldown time between fishing attempts.

Unlock /fish.name: Unlock /fish
Unlock /fish.description: Get the /fish and Fish everyday hour an Item!

Unlock /monthly.name: Unlock /monthly
Unlock /monthly.description: Unlock monthly rewards! Gain a random amount of XP and Gold to power up your medieval journey.

Unlock /weekly.name: Unlock /weekly
Unlock /weekly.description: Unlock weekly rewards! Gain a random amount of XP and Gold to power up your medieval journey.
